title: HOUR 3- Nick Saban and Bryon Cranston 081920
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Nick Saban and Bryon Cranston 081920
description:
Alabama head football coach Nick Saban answers Dan's question about what he remembers about playing against Tom Brady. Coach Nick confirms the Deez Nuts stories are true; coach says he likes to have fun with offensive players on his teams. Bryan Cranston tells Dan how difficult it is to work in the entertainment industry and maintain social distancing.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Alabama head football coach Nick Saban answers Dan's question about what he remembers about playing against Tom Brady.
